Text.Page:
We're taking heavy casualties from those monstrosities in the Blazing Vale.

I need you to destroy the {@LinkCreature:4#1011#fangspawns} and {@LinkCreature:4#1021#sulphurous groknars}.

Report to Keinie at Cauldron Outpost when mission is complete.
The best part of my job is rewarding completed mission orders. Good on ya!

Oh good, another completed...wait, it seems that you haven't quite finished this.

Come by when you're done and I'll have something ready for you.
